org.artorg.tools.phantomData.server.boot

Class ServerBooter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.artorg.tools.phantomData.server.boot.Booter
      • org.artorg.tools.phantomData.server.boot.PropertiesBooter
        • org.artorg.tools.phantomData.server.boot.ServerBooter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleBootServer

    public abstract class ServerBooter
extends PropertiesBooter
    Starts a Spring Boot server application.

    Starting

    Use setServerStartedEmbedded(boolean) for starting the application in a single task. Call initBeforeServerStart(Class, ConsoleFrame, StartupProgressFrame) as an initialization. Call startSpringServer(String[]) for starting the server.

    Shutdown

    Use shutdownSpringServer() for shutting down the server in correct way.

    • Method Detail

      • initBeforeServerStart

        public void initBeforeServerStart(java.lang.Class<?> bootApplicationClass,
                                  ConsoleFrame consoleFrame,
                                  StartupProgressFrame startupProgressFrame)
        Parameters:
        bootApplicationClass - The Spring boot application class annotated with SpringBootApplication.
        consoleFrame - An implementation or null.
        startupProgressFrame - An implementation or null.

      • finish

        public void finish()
        A default procedure for managing the startupFrame and consoleFrame.
        See Also:
        StartupProgressFrame, ConsoleFrame

      • handleException

        public void handleException(java.lang.Exception e)
        Override this method for handling the exception occurred during catchedBoot.
        Overrides:
        handleException in class Booter
        Parameters:
        e - Thrown exception during boot process.

      • deleteFileStructure

        public void deleteFileStructure()
        Deletes all files corresponding by the application based on the paths in the configuration files. All files in phantomData/ will be deleted. The parent directory, where the runnable *.jar file is located will not deleted.
        See Also:
        prepareFileStructure()

      • prepareFileStructure

        public void prepareFileStructure()
        Creates all important paths based on the paths in the configuration files.

      • startSpringServer

        public void startSpringServer(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starts the Spring Boot server application in same thread an will return after a successful boot or throws an exception if connection could not built.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments. Can be empty.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if connection could not built.

      • shutdownSpringServer

        public void shutdownSpringServer()
        Shuts down the server application.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns:
        true if a connection could built with configured settings.

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                         java.sql.SQLException
        Returns:
        Connection to this database based on loaded properties.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If SQL driver was not found.
        java.sql.SQLException - If URL, username or password is wrong.
        See Also:
        PropertiesBooter.getSpringDatasourceUrl(), PropertiesBooter.getDatabaseUsername(), PropertiesBooter.getDatabasePassword()

      • isServerStartedEmbedded

        public boolean isServerStartedEmbedded()
        Returns:
        true if client will boot in same task. Can be used for shutting down the whole application in embedded mode.

      • setServerStartedEmbedded

        public void setServerStartedEmbedded(boolean serverStartedEmbedded)
        Parameters:
        serverStartedEmbedded - true if client will boot in same task. Can be used for shutting down the whole application in embedded mode.s
